properties.body:
SOUTHERN ADRIATIC SEA.
STRAIT OF OTRANTO.
M/V, 27 PERSONS ON BOARD, REQUESTING ASSISTANCE
DUE TO ENGINE FAILURE. LAST KNOWN POSITION
VALONA (40-27.9N 019-19.1E) AT 021955Z SEP.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
39 065 908 4409, FAX: 39 065 922 737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
